website_summaries.verdict: A premium, affordable seat for babies. The best choice for parents on a budget.
pros: Wide, sturdy base and deep, plush seat
cons: Some babies do not find the deep seat to be comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Baby LOVES her puppy seat!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 6 week old. It is one of the only ways she will let us set her down. She loves it so much. Even more than her Graco swing. Also, due to its smaller size it is easy to take from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: RachelDanielleX

customer_reviews.title: THIS WAS GODSENT
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THIS THING SO MUCH! My son (2 weeks old) has had a hard time sleeping in his bassinet, and swing and he started to not sleep at all unless it was on my chest at night. A friend recommended buying this and the moment I put him in this, he went to bed within minutes! He slept all night, (well with me waking him to feeds) and with using this i was able to get more sleep than any other night!
customer_reviews.author: Aaliyah Huson

customer_reviews.title: Nope, bobo
customer_reviews.text: Babies like to kick, yet the bottom edge is hard. In 1 day my boy injured himself against it. Other than that he loved the birdie, but i'll have to return it. Also strap is useless.
customer_reviews.author: ronan carrein

customer_reviews.title: Adorably cute baby seat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this seat, it's cute, the puppy insert is soft & it's the perfect solution for our newborn when we want to sit outside or I want to grab a shower and want to keep him in eyesight. The lightweight chair is easy to move around the house so baby can always be close by.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for newborns
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for newborns! Here’s my 1wk old son, napping soundly. I was able to do stuff while my baby sleeps safely on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ivory Arbilo

customer_reviews.title: Overall, we're happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft this is and absolutely love the pattern and colors. I got the swing to match. However, I wish it sat up a little more. When my son was only 2 or 3 months old, he was already heavy enough to make it go very far back. The ones at his school set him up a little more. This one goes so far back, he'll be touching the ground soon. Overall, we're happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: My newborn's favorite recliner!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bouncer, it's my baby's favorite go-to recliner! We put him in it everyday, its so soft he just Falls right asleep especially when we play it in lullaby mode! It's also washable which is cool, you can take out the center animal piece (I got the "snuggapuppy" one) & throw it right in the washer. A fav at our house!
customer_reviews.author: Salina Corona

customer_reviews.title: Best Baby Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one to purchase. Baby number one used and now baby number 2 will only sleep in this.......so.....we bought a second one! Love them. Sturdy enough for the 3 year old to still get in and pretend he's the baby!
customer_reviews.author: CodySkid

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, son loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son likes this better than his 4moms swing. That being said, it was a little bit if a pain to assemble for a bouncy seat, and it was a little dirty. I was able to wash the seat part easy in the washing machine. Also on the expensive side for a basic bouncy seat, but my baby loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Amber J.

customer_reviews.title: baby loves it! mom loves it! dad loves it! big brother loves it! cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: your baby will love hanging out in this and sleeping in it! it is also an excellent helper to hold baby when you need to set them down to do something else or even just readjust feeding positions. our son loves the lullaby music and especially enjoys the nature sounds listening to the birds chirp is his favorite! the plush dog insert is wonderfully soft and easily adjustable!
customer_reviews.author: tara

customer_reviews.title: not bad for the money
customer_reviews.text: good but for the money, baby is 6 weeks now. we put her in this when she is awake and we have to clean the house. our girl in 9lbs so she slides down and her neck looks a little uncomfortable thats why i took a star off
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Batteries! Order ahead of tiime
customer_reviews.text: This requires batteries. No where in the description does it list the type of batteries, so I assumed they would be fairly common ones that would be easily obtained. ( AA or C or D. ) BUT, no, the batteries required are CLR 14 -- Alkaline C batteries, not just regular). Hard to find. So, we have a bouncer, but cannot test the vibrations or music until batteries arrive. very disappointing. feel misled.
customer_reviews.author: debhuishmac

customer_reviews.title: Probably great for “months old” babies, not “week old” babies
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my newborn but unfortunately it is meant for babies who are a bit more stable. My 4 week old would slide down, even though she was strapped in, and slouch in a way I was scared to leave her because I didn’t want her to suffocate. I don’t even think this will work for a few weeks I’m thinking more like months away. Super soft and seems comfortable but not for newborn babies.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: It seems soft and comfortable for her but the toys are a waste at ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my two month old granddaughter we are babysitting for a few months before she goes to daycare. It seems soft and comfortable for her but the toys are a waste at this age, too far away and not very interesting. The vibration, sounds and music are all nice and soothing. We just put some of our own toys on it and it seems to be working out fine. I put it together in just a few minutes, not hard at all.
customer_reviews.author: sherrywhy

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver when my baby was super congested and the doctor recommended keeping him vertical as much as possible. He started sleeping in it. The nature sounds are okay, the music is annoying, and the vibration just seems to bug my baby, but the bouncing is perfect when he's struggling to fall back asleep. He didn't really use it until 3.5-4 months when he started to weigh enough to stay in it.
customer_reviews.author: EricaTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Also he has had two diaper explosions in it and they wash out so easy in the washing machine so don't worry about it ...
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this so much! Also he has had two diaper explosions in it and they wash out so easy in the washing machine so don't worry about it being white. So soft and always helps him when his tummy hurts. However last time I took the toys off the handle to take the cover off to walk it, something popped out of place and now I can not get them to click back 😔
customer_reviews.author: Willow Hanks

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this! As soon as I set her in it she’s calm, smiling, and coping. She loves the vibration and melodies. Only downside is the batteries died in under 2 months and it is barely used. I maybe use it once a day or every other day for max 10 minutes. Bummer that I’ll be purchasing a ton of batteries but my daughter loves it so.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY DIES SO FAST
customer_reviews.text: It is so cute and so soft and pretty easy to assemble and lovely and the sounds are nice and the vibration is great- BUT the battery only lasts for 3 seconds. I'm exaggerating but I swear I've replaced the battery 10 times already and I just purchased it 2 months ago. And OF COURSE its an incredibly obscure battery so its not like I can just run to Walmart and buy it I have to get it online. So that's annoying!! But I love the swing and my son does too.
customer_reviews.author: kt_hanamann

customer_reviews.title: Soft and plush, not good if baby kicks..
customer_reviews.text: My baby has used this since a little before one month, and currently uses it at almost 5 months. It’s is plush and I like the cover on the buckle so it doesn’t hurt his legs. However, I HATE the placement on the vibration mechanism. It’s a large hard box right where you little ones feet go. My son loves to kick his legs and make it bounce but I have to stuff blankets under his feet so he doesn’t hurt himself kicking that dang box. Really wish they would place it differently.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer does the job. Has music, nature sounds, and vibration setting which helps my daughter stay occupied. Nice and comfy and wide. A lot more convenient then purchasing a bouncer or swing over $100. Only con is the power console for the bouncer is right in the center bottom of the bouncer, if you have a baby like mine who’s 12 weeks old and 24 inches long and is a kicker then you’ll find that their hitting their little ankles on the console. Not too big of a deal I tuck a blanket under her feet to cover the hard part from hurting her, but still an inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Fisher price is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this from amazon warehouse and was going to give it one star because It came with missing parts. Amazon warehouse stated this was like new. The piece was the most important part and I couldn’t use the bouncer with out it. I called fisher price and they sent out a new one. Great product Brand!!!! Love Fisher Price. And this bouncer is plush and wonderful. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: ricky

customer_reviews.title: Bought it Like new, it was new but defective
customer_reviews.text: I bought as new, but the label with fabric content, etc was sewn on the top , front and center! Our grandbaby was not born yet, so we left it in the box for several months, so I did not report it...the seller did not have a chance to correct it. My husband put it together before I looked at it to see this big ugly label! My first grandchild, and was so expecting it to be cute ...oh well. We have not tried out the battery yet to see if it works. It also is big and hard to store....Next time I will examine it more carefully when it arrives. This is totally in me, not the seller!
customer_reviews.author: becky simmons

customer_reviews.title: ... pads as the screws are very flimsy and can easily break leaving you with the screw head in hand ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when screwing the non-slip pads as the screws are very flimsy and can easily break leaving you with the screw head in hand and the rest in the whole. Also the connection on that part of the base is very loose making the whole structure somewhat wobbly. I ended up replacing the pads with zip-ties and that resulted in a more sturdy assembly.
customer_reviews.author: Grigorios Georgolopoulos

customer_reviews.title: Broken in less that 2 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVED the bouncy chair we recieved at my shower, however she began to outgrow it quickly. We ordered this one in hoping it would accommodate her longer. We have had it for exactly 10 days, and the motor no longer works! I tried several brand new sets of batteries, and nothing! The size of the chair is perfect, but I'm incredibly disappointed in the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Wheaton

customer_reviews.title: My baby seems to love using it with Nana
customer_reviews.text: I typically put my son in the swing for a few moments vs this bouncer, but his Nana is his babysitter while I'm at work, and she uses this a lot more. He enjoys looking at the puppy and kitty mobile. He isn't to the point of realizing that he can make it bounce himself so I'm sure once he realizes that he will enjoy it even more. He has NOT been hurt in this, and has not flipped over and been upside down for a long time like I've seen in some reviews, but he also ISN'T left alone for anything like this to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Nycto Katz

customer_reviews.title: My grandson loves it
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this chair. It has the option to slightly bounce or play music. He is not that interested in the hanging characters that come with the chair so I just attach some other characters that he really likes. It was very simple to put together and I have removed the pad once to wash it. It goes into the washer and dryer and was easy to put back on. It does require batteries for the music and bouncing action.
customer_reviews.author: Lilli Ann

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: The problem with this is a baby wouldn’t stay put. They will glide down even with the buckle. It doesn’t vibrate as I wish, but it can soothe them if you lend it some hand by pushing it your self which defeats the purpose. The solution could be to make it adjustable so the incline angle can be adjusted high or low, and have different vibration and bounce levels. It doesn’t bounce much. I’ll say it’s good for a baby about 3 months old and above because they can support themselves somewhat but the bouncing needs an improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Med

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves her new seat!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, we are really pleased with this bouncy seat! The nonskid pads on the feet make it safe enough for my baby to be seated on the kitchen counter while I cook and do dishes. The seat is also lightweight and easy to take all over the house. My only big complaint is that there is pretty much no padding over the button/battery pack so she is constantly kicking the hard plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Only worked for 2 months 😥
customer_reviews.text: This only worked for 2 weeks!! So disappointed. I bought the last of everything I needed a month before the baby came, so by the time I realized it was crap I couldn't return it or even ask for a replacement. I truly loved it when it worked though. Too expensive to only work for 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Holly C.

customer_reviews.title: Manual bouncing is pointless
customer_reviews.text: The only time that my baby likes this is when it is bouncing and it must be manually bounced. This defeats the purpose of the chair which is to keep baby occupied for a moment. The vibrate does nothing for him nor does the music. Also, he is only 5 weeks and his feet hang over the edge. I wish I gaff sent the extra money to get an auto bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Jane

customer_reviews.title: Baby likes this more than mamaroo
customer_reviews.text: We had a mamaroo that my daughter hates because it doesn’t cradle her. I settled on this bouncer because I didn’t want to spend the money on another swing. She loves this, it’s super cozy and the shape cradles her really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s great while it works, but...
customer_reviews.text: It works great when it’s actually working, but the amount of batteries I’ve gone through is ridiculous. This takes 3 C batteries, and I’ve had to replace them daily. My son loves this chair, and I use it for maybe 3 on & off hours throughout the day. When it’s actually working, the vibration is strong enough that my son will sleep soundly. However, it’s just not worth having to replace the batteries in a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 4-months-old loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son when he was 3-weeks-old, he’s four months now and has been using it every single day since then, he loves it! I like that is very easy to move around the house so I can put him next to me all the time, even when I’m taking a shower. the vibration is nice but I haven’t needed that much, the baby just enjoy to sit there. Great purchase and 100% recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ana Briceno

customer_reviews.title: You won’t regret! You’ll love it.
customer_reviews.text: I usually don’t write reviews but I had to for this one. I’ve used 3 different types of bouncers so far. But this one is so far the best bouncer. It’s so soft and my baby feels so cozy in it. My baby slept three hours straight in it. Soothing music and vibrations helps too. The vibration strength is awesome and it is very easy to maneuver. Assembled it single handed in 5 minutes. Don’t buy any other brand . This is the best one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flame retardants made me not want to use it
customer_reviews.text: Really loved this product, but sad to learn this item is full of flame retardant chemicals. Sadly i won’t be using it. Wish fisher price would change their standards with using such hazardous chemicals on their awesome bouncers.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: He loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My newborn loves this chair. Specifically the vibration. It cuts off automatically after, I think, 30 minutes. He literally wakes up the moment it stops vibrating. I wish there was an option for it to not cut off automatically. I would definitely recommend ordering a pack or two of rechargable C batteries with a charger to go with this chair. It will save you (and the environment!) a ton in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: Mckenna

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bouncer for my daughter. She likes to sit in it and she absolutely LOVES the vibrating function (she cries when it shuts off). I don't really care for the dangling mobile piece, so I took it off.
customer_reviews.author: Mitts

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer
customer_reviews.text: I love this little bouncer. I bought it last year for my son and he loved it until he got too fat for it. Not made for big babies lol, once he got too big for it he was basically sitting on the floor. But other than that I love this bouncer. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Sheronica Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love this bouncy!
customer_reviews.text: We love our snugapuppy bouncer! I bought it when my now 7 month old son was a newborn. He loved looking at the toys, the vibration, and music/nature sounds. It is so snuggly and cozy, he almost always fell asleep in this bouncy seat. I love how easy it is to transport from room to room and how durable it is! It is also a cinch to wash, which with blowouts and spit up was a lifesaver! Our little guy still uses his bouncy to play and keep him contained say while I cook dinner or do dishes etc. It is an awesome seat and I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy seat that’s easy to carry around
customer_reviews.text: My newborn loves this bouncer, it’s her favorite place to hang out!! We haven’t even put batteries in it because the kicking motion of her feet is enough to rock it gently and keep her calm and entertained. As a mom to a baby and a toddler, it’s great to have a place to set her down when I need both hands (and she doesn’t scream the whole time). It’s lightweight and easy to carry so you can take it around the house wherever it’s needed.
customer_reviews.author: Cailin S

customer_reviews.title: Not what I thought
customer_reviews.text: My baby didn’t like this at all. I thought it was a bouncer on its own. Nope. You have to bounce it. Also it’s soooooo up right that my baby hated it. She always wake up. I wish it laid back more.
customer_reviews.author: Babbylove

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to clean but SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: This is adorable, I will be taking my daughter to work with me for the first few weeks and this is going to be her little seat in the office. It is super cute and SO SOFT! It was a little hard putting the cover on, and I wouldnt want to see how hard it is to take off when it is dirty LOL
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Huckeby

customer_reviews.title: Decent Bouncy Seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bouncy seat because my son loves the snugapuppy swing so much. It took longer than expected to put together, but that's not a big deal. My son is not a big or tall baby by any means, but his feet and some of his legs stick over the edge which was kind of disappointing. Other than that he likes the toys and the vibrating feature.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney McCauley

customer_reviews.title: Son loves this
customer_reviews.text: So soft and I love the nature sounds incorporated in the music. Volume control is also a huge plus. I’ll use the music on this instead of his swing because even at it’s lowest setting his swing seems too loud. Only complaint is how often I have to change the batteries. It has an automatic shutoff timer for vibration and music but still drains the batteries after shutting down if you forget to turn off master power switch.
customer_reviews.author: Carole Ruddy

customer_reviews.title: Do yourself a favor and get this
customer_reviews.text: A little complicated to assemble but definitely a staple to have in the house! These are one of those things you think you can replace with a hybird/combo/ dual bouncer-whatever thing but you just can’t not have it. Learned my lesson and had to order it when baby was 2 months because she hated the swing bouncer combo one I had registered for and got. Ugh.
customer_reviews.author: lilikins

customer_reviews.title: Weird position for control panel
customer_reviews.text: Light so it can b moved easily. LO keeps staring at the hanging doggie. Soft. Control panel better to have it on e side instead. Not even a month into utilizing this, the control panel went haywire. It decided to stop working, the music, vibration, everything. Despite replacing batteries with new ones. What a letdown...
customer_reviews.author: Chia C.

customer_reviews.title: Will
customer_reviews.text: We love it. But it could be better. Firstly it eats up battery. It doesn’t have enough entertainment but when we bounce it with our feet it makes my son sleepy and comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Girl

customer_reviews.title: this is a great buy and definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could move the overhead thing off at times (my twins become over-stimulated by those little animals dangling down after a long time when sometimes I just want them to nap), otherwise, this is a great buy and definitely worth the money. Great for about 20 minutes of down time to put your baby in. Vibration and sound are nice features.
customer_reviews.author: Cusegirl851

customer_reviews.title: Grateful for the detachable piece
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble this product. My only qualm was the overhanging piece. It simply got in the way when I’d be putting my child in the bouncer so I kept it detached most of the time. My chunky babe grew out of this bouncer pretty quickly but it’s still useful when I’m in a pinch!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Antionette

customer_reviews.title: Would have been perfect had it not been broken on arrival!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start off by saying this would have been a 5-star rating if the product I received wasn’t broken! The fabric was soft, and it was very easy to assemble, but I believe the frame was damaged either in the factory or during shipping. I will order another once I get my refund and update my review based on the new one I receive!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah L.

customer_reviews.title: Be cautious, be very cautious of this product
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product zero stars it would highly be commendable for the price paid. It’s very flimsy and not child safe. I really regret purchasing this product. Fischer price has fallen off TOTALLY. I DO NO NOT RECCOMEND ANY MOTHER PUTTING THEIR NEWBORN IN THIS THING!!!! Very poor quality for the price. Missing parts.....
customer_reviews.author: Kenyatta Grier

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: My son has acid reflux, so after feeding I put him in the chair to sit him up slightly to avoid him spitting up. It works great! He also just loves the chair in general. It has a vibrating setting they helps sooth him if he’s fussy. It’s light weight which makes it easy to carry to any room in the house. The fabric is super soft and comfortable. The only down side it the setting are right in front, so sometimes when he starts kicking his feet around he slams his heals on the top of it, which I assume hurts. I ended up folding a small blanket and sticking it under his heals to avoid him hurting himself.
customer_reviews.author: Highlander

customer_reviews.title: Been searching for this!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE. I have bought/returned 4 different bouncers...I needed one that was reclined enough for comfortable naps and one that cradled baby. This is everything I was looking for. My girl is almost 4 months old and 16 pounds. There is tons of space for her to grow into this. The seat is soft and comfortable. Very happy momma!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin B.

customer_reviews.title: Forget the Mamaroo
customer_reviews.text: We got the beautiful Mamaroo as a baby shower gift only to have our baby scream his lungs out every time we placed him in it. However this little gadget has been a lifesaver for a less than a quarter of the price. Very soft and snuggly, our baby loves it! A must for a new mom who needs to you know eat or use the bathroom once in a while!
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like it at all. Baby constantly slides down. The bouncer is on cheaper side and reflects the quality, which is also cheap. I wish I return it but it is already assembled and painful to take it down and return it. Wasted the money.
customer_reviews.author: ZA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bouncer! It's very cute and pleasing to the eye. I use it EVERY DAY! <3 It would be nice if the dangly toys actually spun but thats ok. Overall great product. Very soft, durable, easy to clean and it took my husband only a few minutes to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Carma Sutra

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer
customer_reviews.text: Great bouncer! I love the head support because my first child had experienced flat head from different bouncer. But i had to return the one that i bought from amazon because my friend gave me another one as a gift. I really love this bouncer. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Alta

customer_reviews.title: Not designed to accommodate any growth
customer_reviews.text: We returned it. Too short for my baby - I think it would have worked when she was a newborn for a short period of time. The main plastic box for operating is placed to she could hurt her feet on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mona Ogbamicael

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine not having it
customer_reviews.text: This is easily the most used baby gear we have. Washes easy too when baby has a blowout.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Momma🌵

customer_reviews.title: Glad we bought this.
customer_reviews.text: This works really well. We also have a $250 4moms Mamaroo but often our 4 month old still prefers to use this. We ended up removing the mobile because she didn’t really care about looking at it. The “puppy” insert is incredibly soft.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: baby gift
customer_reviews.text: I am hormonal at the time of assembling so I was just getting frustrated with everything, but if a pregnant woman with pregnancy brain can put it together anyone can. I haven't had to clean it yet so I am not too sure on how easy it is to clean. Super cute, super soft, and super light to be able to move around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Chair
customer_reviews.text: Has different sound options and the vibration option. Easy to assemble. Super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: MammaOfTwo

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and soft!
customer_reviews.text: This was a favorite baby item that we got. Extremely soft and adorable design. One of the baby items that we will keep from nostalgia after our baby outgrows it!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this bouncer while it worked. I got it in December and it worked for less than a month before it wouldn’t turn on anymore. I thought the batteries died so I changed them and it still won’t turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Sloane

customer_reviews.title: review edit
customer_reviews.text: I need to edit my first review of this product. I now have a complete product and it is wonderful. I bought this for my grandson. he loves sitting in it and hearing either the sounds. He looks very comfortable in it.
customer_reviews.author: sue

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My kids said the baby was having baby bobble-head issues and requested this support system. They have used it everyday since and said it has helped the new grandson enjoy sitting up ( he is two months old).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this, she’s two months and cries until I put her in it after eating breakfast. She actually stares at the little animals and smiles. I’m glad we tried out this cheaper one first before the $100+ ones.
customer_reviews.author: Meg C

customer_reviews.title: Great for reflux babies
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter with reflux. My son also had reflux and used a Fisher-Price Bouncer.
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: A good baby product to have
customer_reviews.text: This bouncer was favorited more by my baby over her 4moms mamaroo bouncer. I guess because she can kick and it moves and it’s more comfy and cozy. Less of an electric machine feel. She actually takes naps in this and really enjoys it and I’m so happy I found it. Cons is It’s very east to trip over it and hard to move it around on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Addy M

customer_reviews.title: Ouch
customer_reviews.text: Cute and cuddly, though a bit plain (which I originally wanted but not now when my son gets bored in 3 minutes...). Also, the bottom feet stick out pretty far and we are constantly stubbing our toes on it. Super annoying!
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: it’s super soft and cute. it was pretty easy to assemble. only thing is the vibration are not super strong, they’re very subtle which is a bit upsetting because i bought this mainly for the vibration feature but anyhow she still loves it!
customer_reviews.author: 💋

customer_reviews.title: Auto shut off stinks
customer_reviews.text: 4 stars because the bouncer has an auto shut off and my baby wakes up , wish it didn’t have the auto shut off or I’d give 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: brittany smith

customer_reviews.title: Chair
customer_reviews.text: Had to get rid of this after these chairs were part of a recall.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if it was a right choice
customer_reviews.text: So after having it for more than a week i am writing this review...... vibration seems to be on a lower side also from mid it seems too loose that new born seems not very comfortable and has bend in her back
customer_reviews.author: iqra arshad

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this as a baby shower gift and my friend love it for her son.
customer_reviews.author: Chanda

customer_reviews.title: The Best chair for baby’s
customer_reviews.text: It's the best thing I've bought for my baby so far. He doesn’t like to be in his crib, he just accepts to leave him in this chair! perfect to leave your baby there, while doing other things.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Vibrates good and smooth
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Vibrates good and smooth, great soothing music and soft as heck! 2nd one I bought, had the monkey one for my first kido. Loved it! Way better than other brands. Fischer price makes as good product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Shubert

customer_reviews.title: My infant son loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bouncer! My son will happily sit there and let me bounce him with my foot while I sit at the table for meals. It makes things so much easier to make both of us happy at meal times of the day. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Dallan & Kimberly Grange

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this infant bouncer. I read it was flimsy and it’s not. It’s wide, comfortable and all the parts fit and screw in perfectly. My baby loves it and so do I!
customer_reviews.author: JaVan Tilghman

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Used very little but was a good buy with the set.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Overall a good product.
customer_reviews.text: We have 6 children and I have tried a ton of baby products and this is one of our go to products. This time though it kinda leaned to one side too much... waited to long to return it. We did/do still use it, just must have been a flawed one.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Have a baby? You NEED this!!!
customer_reviews.text: You NEED this. Putting my twins in these was often the only way they would go to sleep. They love them! (And you will too) not sure what I will do once they grow out of them. You have to rock these with you foot. They are light weight and the color is nice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I loved this bouncer & my baby loves it. I got it a few months ago and my babu still fits well into it. It does not bend back even though she is 6 months and 18 pounds heavy... I can see her using it maybe 2-3 more months before she outgrows it because of her length.
customer_reviews.author: Dulce Q

customer_reviews.title: You have to put it together
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I didn’t like was having to put the whole thing together. Other than that it’s very cute and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Ge

customer_reviews.title: Big, Comfy
customer_reviews.text: It is very big, I didnt expect it to be so large. Fits better on the floor instead of countwr or table where I wanted it. It looks very soft and comfy for baby. I havent tried it out yet but I can see us using this a lot.
customer_reviews.author: NikiSonja

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Better fisher price had invested in the bouncing feature instead of vibrate. It's annoying to manually bounce the baby as the so called self bouncing system is rediculous. Plus baby hates the vibrate.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncer for extra fussy infants!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft this bouncer is! Not to mention how cute the pattern is! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Twin momma

customer_reviews.title: Already Quit Working, Sigh
customer_reviews.text: Had this thing for about 2 months and it quit working. We’d return it but we’re just outside the return window. Jokes on us, don’t let it be on you.
customer_reviews.author: Abishai

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces/customer service
customer_reviews.text: The Moonlight Meadow bouncer I received did not come with the advertised mobile and toys. I contacted the company and was told they would get back to me "in several business days" so I am not expecting much. My little guy really likes looking at mobiles and the seat is kind of boring without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect adorable seat.
customer_reviews.text: This is just so adorable. I just love the Warehouse deals, perfect condition, for half the price. The seat is perfect for infants and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great for fussy babies
customer_reviews.text: Anytime my 2 week old is fussing all I do is stick him in this bouncer and he is immediately calm and content
customer_reviews.author: lyn

customer_reviews.title: Snug as a bug
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandchild to use while at my house. She loves it and sits very contently in it while I cook or do some other little things around the house. Seems very soft and comfortable. Easy to assemble, I put it together myself. She's gotten the hang of kicking to make it bounce and seems to really enjoy that alot!
customer_reviews.author: SandersonGirl4

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best!
customer_reviews.text: This bouncy has all the bells and whistles for a reasonable price. Vibrating with music, it has a good battery life. The fabric and design is very snuggly.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great bouncy seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat.for baby to set in when I'm all over the house cleaning or getting my family ready, really anything. It is super comfy and easy to move around from room to room.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Bullock

customer_reviews.title: 4/5 Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this product for our son and he seems to be enjoying it. It is not as loud as I would like it to be and batteries do go by fast but for the price it’s a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Buy this bouncer
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bouncer, and so does my little girl. She is a month old and is at the stage where we are not allowed to put her down, and she won’t sleep anywhere but our arms. Well now that we have this bouncer we can put her down and she will actually sleep in it!
customer_reviews.author: Kaela Plante

customer_reviews.title: Great seat
customer_reviews.text: This seat is awesome- have used it since my LO was born and she is now 3 months (about 12.5 lbs). The lining is soft and my girl loves the hanging animals. We have two of these- one upstairs and one downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: A. Klaw

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!!!even though she’s too big for it now I’m looking to sell it..it last up to 3 months and couple weeks get it guys your baby will love it
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: Gender neutral, soft, cute
customer_reviews.text: Really love this, this is one of the first things i bought when i found out i was pregnant. We don’t know our babies gender yet, but the soft neutral colors makes it good for boys or girls. Can’t wait to use this with our little one!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Just vibrates and makes baby cry
customer_reviews.text: Its just like a uncomfy chair which looks pretty. Doesnt bounce on its own. Only vibrates and plays music for 20 minutes. My baby doesnt like it.
customer_reviews.author: shally neh

product_meta.title: Fisher-Price Moonlight Meadow Deluxe Bouncer
product_meta.description:
Style:Moonlight MeadowYour baby will love snuggling into the comfy, deep seat of the Fisher-Price Moonlight Meadow Deluxe Bouncer! This cozy infant seat gently bounces along to your baby's natural movements, with soothing vibrations and up to 20 minutes of music and nature sounds to help your baby relax. When they're in the mood to play, two plush woodland animal toys dangle overhead on the removable mobile to encourage your baby to reach and bat.

BRAND STORY
By Fisher Price
feature_bullets: Portable infant seat that gently bounces along to your baby's natural movements
Removable mobile with 2 plush woodland animal toys
Calming vibrations and up to 20 minutes of music and nature sounds
Machine-washable seat pad and newborn insert
Non-skid feet and secure, three-point harness

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,064 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
